action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains five shapes. One is a purple plus sign. One is a pink shape that looks like a capital P with a horizontal line extending from the bottom. One is a green shape that looks like a capital F with a horizontal line extending from the top. One is an orange shape that looks like a capital L with a horizontal line extending from the top. One is an orange shape that looks like a capital L with a horizontal line extending from the bottom.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains 7 Tetris blocks. There are 3 red blocks, 2 yellow blocks, 1 orange block, and 1 purple block. The red blocks are in the shape of an L, a T, and a backwards L. The yellow blocks are in the shape of a plus sign and a backwards L. The orange block is in the shape of a T. The purple block is in the shape of a backwards L.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains five shapes. One is a purple plus sign. One is a pink shape that looks like a capital P with a horizontal line extending from the bottom. One is a green shape that looks like a capital F with a horizontal line extending from the top. One is an orange shape that looks like a capital L with a horizontal line extending from the top. One is an orange shape that looks like a capital L with a horizontal line extending from the bottom.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image rotated?

The red blocks are in the shape of an L, a T, and a backwards L. The yellow blocks are in the shape of a plus sign and a backwards L. The orange block is in the shape of a T. The purple block is in the shape of a backwards L.
